author: BornToBeRoot
body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Write a descriptive title.
- [X] Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- [X] Search the existing issues.
- [X] Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- [X] Refer to [Differences between Windows PowerShell 5.1 and PowerShell](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/differences-from-windows-powershell).

### Steps to reproduce

See this Dependabot PR: https://github.com/BornToBeRoot/NETworkManager/pull/1689

& Build: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/BornToBeRoot/networkmanager/builds/45323761

i am using `using System.Management.Automation;` to create a PowerShell with `System.Management.Automation.PowerShell.Create()`.

```
error CS0234: The type or namespace name 'Management' does not exist in the namespace 'System' (are you missing an assembly reference?) [C:\projects\networkmanager\Source\NETworkManager.Models\NETworkManager.Models.csproj]
```

### Expected behavior

```console
Update from 7.2.7 to 7.3.0 should work.

Or at least have some docs about migrating this.
I cannot find anything about this in the changelog / docs / issues.
```


### Actual behavior

```console
error CS0234: The type or namespace name 'Management' does not exist in the namespace 'System' (are you missing an assembly reference?)
```


### Error details

_No response_

### Environment data

```powershell
Project is on .NET 6.x
```


### Visuals

_No response_

comments.author: mehdifirefox
comments.body:
Sorry I didn't open the new thread

I updated
But why was the new powershell installed?
Why didn't PowerShell update Windows?

Does this differ from the original?

comments.author: BornToBeRoot
comments.body: @mehdifirefox I do not know what this comment has to do with the error I have described above

comments.author: aluty

title: CS0234 Namespace "Management" not found after update Microsoft.PowerShell.SDK from 7.2.7 to 7.3.0
